events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a request for a money back refund due to size issues with the product.
Assigning case to the returns and refund specialist team for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to help with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket? This will help us process your refund swiftly.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, still with tags and packaging intact. Ready to return.
Thank you for the details. You may send back the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will refund the full purchase amount.
Thanks for your quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return shipment!
We've received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we haven't heard back, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us again anytime for support. Have a great day!
